{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
def evaluate_pgn(pgn, engine, limit=chess.engine.Limit(time=.1)):
    game = chess.pgn.read_game(pgn)
    all_evals = []
    while game:
        all_evals.append(evaluate_game(game, engine, limit))
        game = chess.pgn.read_game(pgn)
    df = pd.DataFrame(all_evals)
    return df
